body:
HI


I am running simulations of Blinds in a small office room. I am 
trying to get glare values for my viewpoints. While running the 
findglare program I get the following segmentation fault


findglare -vf bestview.vp -ga 10-60:10 -av .1 .1 .1 sample1.oct


Segmentation fault


Any Advice would be helpful.. Thanx in advance..


G V DEEPAK
Graduate student and Research Assistant
M.E. Rinker, Sr. School of Building Construction.
University Of Florida.
